Matt Damon haters came out of the closet when it was thought he’d be the next Captain Kirk. Well now we know that heee’s not gooooing tobe the neeext Kirk. But Sarah Silverman is fucking him. Yes, she’s fucking Matt Damon (the video is slightly NSFW).

An homage to foXnoMad’s earlier days…still hate him?

[via Kate’s Random Musings]
